title: Draft queue issue
body: Since the patch, each time I attempt to queue for draft pick, screen is perpetually stuck loading.  After about 30 seconds it just goes back to the home screen with no error message or anything.  Why?

replies.body:
It looks like you might be affected by an incredibly rare bug with Dynamic Queue.  This is something we have been tracking over the past several days and are working on a fix, but essentially it locks your account from being able to enter the lobby.  This is only account specific though, so you should be able to hop on a smurf and play normally.

We are hoping to get a fix out ASAP, but as of right now, there isn't any other steps I can provide >.<
Incredibly rare bug sounds about my luck.  Will have to wait then
